page.title: 19LYDFORD TWINNING
page.content: "Twinning" between the people of Devon and Calvados in France is to encourage and have links one with the other and reciprocate in exchanges in relation to cultural,economic and social affairs and tourism so as to develop co operation, mutual understanding and friendship between them. A village called Petiville was chosen and exploratory visits were made. The official signing of a charter took place at Petiville in October 1978 with 20 Lydford people present and at Lydford in July 1979 in the Castle grounds with much celebration.Since that time exchange visits have taken place between families and friends and in June 1982 a party of 18 children and their teacher came to Lydford for 5 days then a delegation from Lydford went over to Petiville for the opening of their new school.
